name: MIS National Report of Prisoners With Financial Order Alert
description: This report lists the active prisoners in the esate with a current financial order alert (is a Security alert with an alert code of XFO).

dataset.name: XFO Prisoners
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_ALERT.ALERT_CODE_NK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_ALERT AT_ALERT, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL, BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_ALERT AT_OFFENDER_ALERT WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_OFFENDER_ALERT.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+)) AND (AT_ALERT.ALERT_SK (+) = AT_OFFENDER_ALERT.ALERT_SK) AND (AT_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND (CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6 OR CSL.ENDYEAR = '2999'))) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_STATUS = 'O') AND AT_ALERT.ALERT_ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' AND AT_ALERT.ALERT_CODE_NK = 'XFO')), dataset_ AS (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SURNAME, FIRST_NAME, ALERT_CODE_NK FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: MIS Load
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT TRUNC(BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_END_DATETIME) AS LOAD_END_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT LOAD_END_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Balances for XFO Prisoners
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.CASELOAD_ID, AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.DESCRIPTION, SUM(COALESCE(CASE WHEN NOT AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK IS NULL THEN AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.HOLD_BALANCE END, 0)) AS SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_ACCOUNT_51, SUM(COALESCE(CASE WHEN NOT AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK IS NULL THEN AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.CURRENT_BALANCE END, 0)) AS SUM_OF_ACCOUNT_OPENING_BALANCE FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE, BODIMIS.CASELOADS AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS, BODIMIS.DIM_ALERT AT_ALERT, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES, BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_ALERT AT_OFFENDER_ALERT WHERE (AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.BALANCE_DATE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK = AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK (+)) AND (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.CASELOAD_ID = AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.CASELOAD_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.TRUST_ACCOUNTS_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_OFFENDER_ALERT.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+)) AND (AT_ALERT.ALERT_SK (+) = AT_OFFENDER_ALERT.ALERT_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND (CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6 OR CSL.ENDYEAR = '2999'))) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_STATUS = 'O') AND AT_ALERT.ALERT_ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' AND AT_ALERT.ALERT_CODE_NK = 'XFO' AND AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES.DAY_DATE = TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.CASELOAD_ID, AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.DESCRIPTION HAVING (SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE) = '2102' THEN (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.CURRENT_BALANCE) ELSE 0 END) > 0 OR SUM(COALESCE(CASE WHEN NOT AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK IS NULL THEN AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.HOLD_BALANCE END, 0)) > 0)), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, CASELOAD_ID, DESCRIPTION, SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_ACCOUNT_51, SUM_OF_ACCOUNT_OPENING_BALANCE FROM dataset_base_)

field.name: SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_ACCOUNT_51
